body: //div[contains(concat(' ',normalize-space(@class),' '),' left ')]

strip_id_or_class: native-ad
strip_id_or_class: newsletter_youngtimer
strip_id_or_class: block-auteur
strip_id_or_class: title-block
strip_id_or_class: teaser-x-items
strip_id_or_class: newsletter-atp
strip_id_or_class: occasion
strip: //link

replace_string(<h2): <p
replace_string(</h2>): </p>

test_url: https://www.autoplus.fr/peugeot/3008/actualite/Peugeot-3008-SUV-Scoop-Equipements-1549589.html
